publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1831 Mr Jack McConnell: Scotland’s International Image—That the Parliament shares the Scottish Executive’s ambitions to build relationships across national and regional boundaries to deliver social, political, cultural and economic gain; welcomes efforts to promote Scotland’s international image and to attract people to visit, live, work, study and do business in Scotland; acknowledges the importance of promoting Scotland’s interests overseas; agrees that Scotland has a role in meeting the shared responsibilities of the international community, and welcomes the publication of the Executive’s first international strategy. Supported by: Mr Jim Wallace*
